item.title: The Live Deployment (Stories from Bitopia)
item.description: It was a dark rainy night. You could hear some stray dogs howling, probably annoyed as well by the heavy rain. Everyone was at home. Well, except us, me and Marcel. We were getting ready for what was supposed to be my first live deployment since I joined Codis. â€œIt needs to be done during the night, when our users are busy fucking, living their pitiful worry-less lives!
